cmput301exchange.exchange

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301exchange.exchange.Book
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shareable, java.lang.Comparable<Book>

    public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shareable, java.lang.Comparable<Book>
    Book is the object that makes up the inventory class Book book = new Book(){ book.updateTitle("Harry Potter"); book.updateAuthor("J.K Rowling"); ... }

      • updateCategory

        public void updateCategory(java.lang.String updatedcat)
        Updates the Category of the book to an Arbitrary String. The 10 Categories rule is imposed by the design of the Sorting, adding, and Browsing pages.
        Parameters:
        updatedcat - the new category to assign to the item
